name: Real Drive:Drift Simulation
description:
Drift's new name Real Drive:Drift Simulation:

Dragging is as much fun and real as ever.
You will strangle the roads in different mappings.

- Customized car physics and effective drift system;
- Different cars;
- systematically modified parts;
- Realistic 3D graphics;
- You can choose different control options (buttons, steering or acceleration);
- Adjustable camera options.

More about updates!.
